summary: Teddy Bears Picnic covers an annual encampment of prominent male leaders at the Zambezi Glen, a thinly-veiled reference to the Bohemian Grove.
cast: Dick Butkus|Burt Bulos|Bob Einstein|Morgan Fairchild|Henry Gibson|Joyce Greenleaf|Gilley Grey|Annabelle Gurwitch|John Michael Higgins|Howard Hesseman|Joyce Hyser|Richard Israel|Darron Johnson|Justin Kirk|Jim Lampley|Robert Mandan|John Marrott|Kenneth Mars|Peter Marshall|Michael McKean|Delaune Michel|Phil Miller|Ming-Na Wen|John O'Hurley|Judith Owen|Julie Payne|Kiran Rao|David Rasche|Thom Sharp|Harry Shearer|Kurtwood Smith|Joseph Sordetto|Brenda Strong|Alan Thicke|Dale E. Turner|George Wendt|David Todd West|Travis Wester|Fred Willard|Barry Wiggins|Scott Aaronson|David E. Baker|Jeffrey Coburn|Michael M. Joshua|Christian Malmin|Joan Marlowe|Larry Miller|Terry Ray|Kennedy Stone|Marcus Vaughn
title: Teddy Bears' Picnic
